name: Delivering Bones
description:
You have been hired as a Mailman. But be careful! You might get bad reviews if the doggos eat the mail. And if you get Zero Stars you will be fired.

Controls: 

Q = Get more B O N E S

WASD = Move

Left Click = Throw Mail

Right Click = Throw Bones (will make doggo happeh)

Space = Pickup/put down Mailbox
